scripts.deploy:devnet: cd packages/snfoundry_dev && dotenv -e .env -- yarn workspace @ss-2/snfoundry_dev deploy:devnet $*
scripts.deploy:sepolia: cd packages/snfoundry_dev && dotenv -e .env -- yarn workspace @ss-2/snfoundry_dev deploy:sepolia $*
scripts.account:devnet: cd packages && cd snfoundry_dev && dotenv -e .env -- yarn workspace @ss-2/snfoundry_dev add-account:devnet $*
scripts.account:sepolia: cd packages && cd snfoundry_dev && dotenv -e .env -- yarn workspace @ss-2/snfoundry_dev add-account:sepolia $*
scripts.format: yarn workspace @ss-2/nextjs format && yarn workspace @ss-2/snfoundry_dev format
scripts.format:check: yarn workspace @ss-2/nextjs format:check && yarn workspace @ss-2/snfoundry_dev format:check
